fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A review of the opera The Hunting Gun at Aldeburgh’s Snape Maltings omitted the last name of Samuel Boden, who plays the unnamed poet. Peter Schöne, who plays Misugi, was not one of the cast members repeating their role from last year’s Bregenz festival, as we mistakenly said (10 June, page 13, G2). • Other recently corrected articles include: Michael Gove admits to taking cocaine on ‘several occasions’ Listeria outbreak: three patient deaths linked to chicken sandwiches Conservatives should change how they think about global warming. I did Political violence against women tracked for first time as attacks soar
